markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Frog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=675)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant frogs can grow up to 6 feet long and weigh over 200 pounds, with rows of razor-sharp teeth lining their gaping mouths.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Frog_GiantFrog.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Giant Frog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=675)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8,
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +8 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** tongue grab

**Sticky Feet**   Giant frogs are not flat-footed when [Balancing](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on a narrow surface, and they gain a +4 bonus to Reflex saves to avoid falling.

**Tongue Grab**   A creature hit by the giant frog's tongue becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the giant frog. The creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of the frog's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a Strike against AC 13 that deals at least 2 slashing damage. This deals no damage to the frog but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-137" />
name: Giant Frog

Tongue Grab A creature hit by the giant frog's tongue becomes grabbed by the giant frog. The creature isn't immobilized, but it can't move beyond the reach of the frog's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a Strike against AC 13 that deals at least 2 slashing damage.
